result.markdown:
--- title: "Raw cases" author: Raphael Saldanha date: last-modified --- This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering dengue raw cases time-series similarities. ## Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(arrow) library(timetk) library(dtwclust) library(kableExtra) library(tictoc) source("../functions.R") ``` ::: ## Load data Load the bundled data. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- open_dataset(sources = data_dir("bundled_data/tdengue.parquet")) %>% select(mun, date, cases = cases_raw) %>% collect() dim(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 1529052 3 ``` ::: ::: ### Prepare data The chunk bellow formats the dataset for `tsclust` use. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- tdengue %>% # Prepare time series arrange(mun) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = mun, values_from = cases) %>% select(-date) %>% t() %>% # Convert object tslist() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} length(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 3052 ``` ::: ::: ## Clustering Sequence of `k` groups to be used. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} k_seq <- 3:10 ``` ::: ### DTW method ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() clust <- tsclust( series = tdengue, type = "partitional", k = k_seq, distance = "dtw_basic", seed = 13 ) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 885.794 sec elapsed ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster Validity Indices (CVI) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(clust) <- paste0("k_", k_seq) res_cvi <- sapply(clust, cvi, type = "internal") %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "k") %>% arrange(-Sil) res_cvi %>% kbl() %>% kable_styling() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
k Sil SF CH DB DBstar D COP
k_3 0.5668890 0 756.8688 3.240129 14.60189 0.0006137 0.1716353
k_4 0.3686314 0 474.2373 3.395145 45.32376 0.0002016 0.0595228
k_5 0.2603404 0 461.8422 3.397394 159.14213 0.0001007 0.0181070
k_6 0.2449685 0 334.9730 3.525329 107.17956 0.0001415 0.0354917
k_9 0.2065265 0 242.9163 3.811424 174.35124 0.0001007 0.0180477
k_7 0.1630632 0 244.6162 4.104858 123.96261 0.0000743 0.0594859
k_10 0.0089230 0 227.4877 3.605120 317.76194 0.0000109 0.0169681
k_8 -0.0091527 0 216.5552 4.260783 207.51837 0.0000159 0.1709365
````` ::: ::: ### Cluster with higher Silhouette statistic ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sel_clust <- clust[[res_cvi[[1,1]]]] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(filename = "cluster_long.pdf") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Saving 7 x 5 in image ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust, type = "centroids", lty = 1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_long_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Cluster sizes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table(sel_clust@cluster) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 1 2 3 683 169 2200 ``` ::: ::: ## Session info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.3.1 (2023-06-16) Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu
